content: g a b r i o l a t o q u e by jennifer emslie one size fits most adults you ll need 1 ball jody long colourspun 5mm 16 circ 6mm 16 circ 6mm dpns wool needle gauge 15 sts and 20 rnds = 10cm with 5mm needle cast on 72 sts join in round placing marker at join work k1 p1 ribbing for 4 change to 6mm needle and work in stocking stitch knit for 4 work now measures 8 from cast on begin crown shaping change to dpns when necessary rnd1- *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end of round rnd2 and all even rounds- knit rnd3- *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round rnd5- *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round rnd7- *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round rnd9- *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round rnd11-*k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round rnd13- *k2tog repeat from * to end of round draw yarn thru remaining sts and secure weave in all ends enjoy www instagram com/uptown_yarns
